card_description: Enhance Commit: Add the top card of your discard pile to your card pool. This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Deadlock First Enhance Commit: Double your Weapon attack’s speed and damage.
Enhance: Add 1 asset or Weapon foundation from your discard pile to your card pool or hand.
Form [Once per turn] Permanently reduce your character’s hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
Enhance Commit: Your Fury or Punch attack gains Powerful: X. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
"Powerful: X - Enhance Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +X damage for each momentum used to pay the cost of this ability."
Combo Enhance: This attack gains Stun: 2.
Enhance: Build 1 foundation from your card pool face up.
"Combo (___) - This attacks's Combo Enhance cannot be played unless the card immediately preceding it matches the requirement in parenthesis."
Enhance: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if this attack has received a speed bonus.
Deadlock Enhance: Add the top 2 cards of your deck to your momentum.
"EX: X - Enhance Discard 1 or more momentum: This attack gets +X speed for each momentum used to pay the cost of this ability."
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Add up to 3 cards from your hand to your momentum.
All Might Enhance Permanently reduce your character’s hand size by 1: Draw 3 cards.
Enhance: If this attack deals damage, build the next foundation you play face up.
Enhance: If a Punch attack has dealt damage this turn, draw 1 card.
Response: After your rival commits 1 or more foundations during this attack’s Enhance Step, it gets +1 speed.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the speed of this attack minus 3.
Combo Enhance: The next 2 Weapon cards you try to play this turn ignore progressive difficulty.
Enhance: Draw 1 card for each foundation in your card pool.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your rival flips 1 foundation.
Enhance [Once per turn] Discard the top 5 cards of your deck: Add 1 copy of “Summon Dark Shadow” from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. Only playable while committed.
Enhance: Your next Kick attack this turn gets +2 speed and +2 damage.
Enhance: Draw 1 card.
Response Flip: After 1 of your foundations is removed or destroyed, build the top card of your deck face down.
Enhance Commit, discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.
Combo Enhance: This attack gets +4 damage.
Enhance Discard 1 card: Your next attack this turn gets +4 damage.
While this card is in your card pool, your attacks get +1 speed and +1 damage.
Enhance: Your next check to play a card this turn gets +3. Commit your character.
Enhance Flip: Draw 1 card. If this was not the first Enhance played this Enhance Step, discard 1 card.
Enhance Destroy: End this Enhance Step.
Enhance Commit, discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.
Enhance Flip: Add 1 of your momentum to the top of your deck.
Response Commit: After your rival’s attack
receives a damage bonus, it gets -3 speed.
Response Commit: After your attack receives a speed bonus, it gets +2 damage.
Enhance: Actions in your card pool do not count towards progressive difficulty for the rest of this turn.
Enhance: If this attack has received a speed and damage bonus, it gets +3 damage and gains
Stun: 1.
Enhance Commit: Your Weapon attack gets +1 speed and +2 damage.
Enhance Commit: This Mid or Kick attack gets +2 speed.
First Enhance Commit: Choose 1 rival foundation. abilities on the chosen card can not be played for the rest of this Enhance Step.
Response Flip: After you commit any number of cards due to your rival’s effect, build the top card of your deck face down. Playable while committed.
Response Commit 1 foundation: Before the damage Step of this unblocked attack, reduce its damage to 6.
Enhance: Your non-Throw attack gets a damage bonus equal to its printed difficulty.
Enhance: If your character is committed, this attack gets +2 damage.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 speed for each ally card in your card pool.
Enhance Destroy 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, destroy 1 rival foundation. If your character is Nomu, build the top card of your deck face down.
Deadlock Enhance: Destroy 2 rival foundations.
Enhance Destroy: Add 1 Punch attack from your card pool to your momentum.
Deadlock Enhance: Your Punch attack gets +2 speed and gains Stun: 1.
Response [Once per turn]: After your non-Throw attack deals damage, your rival loses 5 health.
Response Commit: After you completely block an attack, your rival destroys 1 ready foundation.
Enhance: Add 1 action from your discard pile to your card pool.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival loses 1 health for each Ally card in your card pool.
"Deadlock - This ability may only played if your rival has more than 10 foundations in their stage."
Enhance: If you have fewer foundations than your rival, destroy 1 rival foundation.
Enhance Lose 3 health: Your next Fury or Punch attack gets +5 damage.
Enhance Destroy: Return this attack to its printed speed. If it is a Punch attack, it gets +2 damage.
Enhance Destroy: Return this attack to its printed damage. If it is a Punch attack, it gets +2 speed.
Enhance Lose 2 health: This attack gets +2 or -2 speed. If this attack is blocked, destroy 1 rival foundation. Remove this card from the game.
Deadlock Enhance: Destroy 1 rival foundation.
Remove this card from the game.
Response [Once per game]: After your Charge attack deals damage, add all cards from your card pool to your momentum. This ability cannot be canceled.
Enhance: If your Charge or Stun attack is blocked, commit 1 rival foundation.
If your printed hand size is less than your rival’s, this attack gets -1 difficulty.
Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, your rival destroys 1 foundation.
EX: X - Enhance Discard 1 of more momentum: This attack gets +X speed for each momentum used to pay the cost of this ability.
Enhance Flip: This attack gets -3 damage. Only playable if you have an Ally card in your card pool.
Deadlock Enhance: Your Ally or Ranged attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Combo Enhance Lose 2 Health: Add 1 copy of "Relentless Barrage” from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 damage.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your next attack this turn gets +2 speed and +2 damage.
Deadlock Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 3 damage.
Enhance Flip: Flip 1 rival foundation.
Shigaraki Response: After you block with this card, ready your character.
Combo Enhance: This attack can only be blocked by cards with a printed block modifier of +3 or greater.
Enhance Flip: This High or Low attack gets -2 speed.
Enhance: This attack gets +2 damage for each card in your momentum.
Deadlock Enhance: Your rival commits 1 foundation for each card in your momentum.
Combo Enhance Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is completely blocked, add it to your hand after it resolves.
Enhance: If this attack is not blocked, draw 1 card.
Enhance Lose 1 health: Your attack gets+1 damage.
Enhance Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 damage.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Your next check to play a card gets +2.
Enhance: Add this card to the top of your deck.
Enhance Destroy 1 foundation: Destroy 1 foundation committed due to this attack’s Stun ability. Your rival may lose 2 health to cancel this ability.
Enhance Lose 2 health: Your rival loses 2 health. your rival may destroy 1 foundation to cancel this ability.
Enhance Destroy: This attack gets -2 speed. playable while committed.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Flip: Commit 1 rival foundation.
Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage during the Damage Step.
Response Flip: After your rival loses health due to an effect, your rival loses 1 health. This effect cannot reduce your rival below 1 health.
Response Flip: After you lose health due to your rival's attack or effect, gain 3 health.
Enhance: If your character is committed, this attack gets +1 damage.
Enhance Lose 1 health: Your attack gets +1 speed.
Response Destroy: After this card is committed
due to your rival’s effect, your rival destroys 1 foundation. Playable while committed.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Flip: Add the top card of your deck to your momentum.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +3 damage.
Response: After your attack is partially blocked, draw 2 cards.
Response [Once per game]: After an attack is completely blocked, your rival reveals their hand.
Choose 1 card in their hand and discard it.
Enhance: Change the zone of your attack.
Response [Once per turn]: After your Charge or High attack resolves, add it to your momentum.
Enhance Commit: If you have 1 or more momentum, your attack gets +3 speed. You may add 1 momentum to your hand.
Enhance Commit: Your Fury attack gains Stun: 1.
Response Flip: After your rival builds a foundation during the Combat Phase, commit it. Playable while committed.
Enhance: Add 1 foundation to your momentum.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 to its Powerful rating for each Charge or High attack in your card pool.
Enhance Commit: Your attack gets +2 speed. you may discard 1 Kick or Ranged attack from your card pool.
Enhance Flip 1 foundation: Ready this card. playable while committed.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each committed rival foundation.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Your rival commits 1 foundation.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Add 1 copy of "Meteor Shower” from your discard pile to your momentum.
Enhance [Momentum] Discard 1 card: add this card to your hand.
Enhance: If this attack is not blocked, commit 1 rival foundation.
Deadlock Enhance: Add 2 rival foundations to the bottom of their deck.
"Throw - If this attack is completely blocked, it deals half damage (rounded up) during the Damage Step."
Enhance: If your character is committed, commit 1 rival foundation.
Sero Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack cannot be blocked by mid blocks.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is not blocked, your rival discards 1 card.
Response: After this card leaves your card pool during the Combat Phase, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
Enhance: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +3 speed.
Response Remove: After your Charge or Stun attack deals damage, add 1 card from your discard pile to your momentum.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Flip: This attack gets +3 damage.
Deadlock Enhance: Add 1 momentum to your hand.
Enhance Flip: If you have 1 or more momentum, ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.
If this attack is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Enhance [Momentum] Remove: After your attack resolves, add it to your momentum.
Enhance: This attack gets +1 damage for each of your ready face down foundations.
Enhance: Ready 2 face down foundations.
Enhance [Your attack] Discard 1 momentum: Commit 1 rival foundation.
Enhance Destroy: Commit 1 rival foundation.
Enhance: If your character is committed, this attack gets +2 damage.
Enhance: Draw 1 card. Only playable if a card
has left your card pool this turn.
Enhance Destroy: Return this non-Charge attack to its printed damage.
Midoriya/Uraraka Response Commit: After you take 5 or more damage, gain 1 health.
Enhance Flip: Change this attack’s speed to 4.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Change the zone of this attack.
Enhance: If the zone of this attack is High, it gets +2 speed.
Enhance: If the zone of this attack is Low, it gets +2 damage.
Enhance [Once Per Turn]: If a card has left your card pool this turn, ready this foundation. Playable while committed.
Response Flip: After your rival plays an attack,
change its zone to High.
This attack cannot be completely blocked.
Response: After the zone of this attack is changed, it gets +2 damage.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Change the zone of this attack. This Enhance is playable any number of times this Enhance Step.
Enhance [Once per turn]: Build the top card of your deck face down.
Enhance [Twice per turn] Add 1 foundation from your stage to your hand: This attack gets +2 or -2 damage.
Response Flip: After your rival plays an attack,
change its zone to High.
Enhance Destroy 1 face down foundation: Build the top card of your deck face down.
Enhance: If this attack is blocked, your rival discards 1 card.
Response: After this card is committed during the Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 or -1 speed. playable while committed.
Enhance Flip: Look at the top card of your deck.
Deadlock Enhance Commit: If a card has left your card pool this turn, add 1 Ranged attack from your discard pile to your hand.
Enhance Flip: Change this attack’s zone to Mid.
Enhance Flip: This Mid attack gets -2 speed.
Enhance Remove: Look at your momentum and turn 1 of them face up.
Response Flip: After a card is added to your momentum, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.
Enhance Destroy: Ready 2 face down foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets+1 or -2 speed.
Enhance Flip: If this attack is blocked, it deals no damage.
Enhance: If this attack is completely blocked, build it face down after it resolves.
Enhance: If you have built a card this turn, this attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Change the zone of your attack.
Enhance: If the zone of your attack has been changed, it gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
Enhance Flip, choose 1 of the following effects:
• Both players discard 1 momentum.
• The next attack this turn loses EX.
• The next attack this turn loses Powerful.
• The next attack this turn loses Stun.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets+1 damage for every 2 Ranged attacks in your discard pile.
Response Commit, discard the top 3 cards of your deck: After your rival plays an Enhance ability on a non-character card, cancel it.
Enhance: Add 1 face down foundation from your stage to your hand. Build the top card of your deck face down.
Enhance Name an attack zone [High, Mid, or Low]:
If your rival’s next attack this turn matches that zone, it gets -3 speed.
Enhance [Once per turn] Discard your hand: your Punch attack gets +10 damage.
Enhance: If you have 6 or more Ranged attacks in your discard pile, draw 2 cards.
Enchance Discard the top 3 cards of your deck: This attack gets +2 damage for each Ranged attack discarded this way.
Enhance Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets+1 damage for every 2 Ranged attacks in your discard pile.
Response Commit, discard the top 3 cards of your deck: After your rival plays an Enhance ability on a non-character card, cancel it.
Response: After you flip 1 or more foundations during your attack’s Enhance Step, your attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage. Playable while committed.
Enhance Commit: The next card you attempt to play this turn gets -1 difficulty for each of your face down foundations.
Enhance: This attack cannot be blocked by attack cards.
Deadlock Enhance: This attack gets +2 speed. the speed of this attack cannot be reduced.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: Build 1 card from your hand face down. This attack gets +5 damage.
Enhance: Your rival cannot play action cards during this attack.
Enhance Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets
+5 speed. Only playable if this attack’s damage is 10 or greater.
Enhance Discard the top card of your deck: Your next check to play a Ranged attack gets +1.
Deadlock Enhance: The next check you make to play an attack passes.
First Enhance Commit: Unflip 1 committed foundation.
Deadlock Form Remove: Add up to 2 Ranged attacks from your card pool to your hand.
Response Commit: After your blocked attack resolves, build it face down.
Deadlock Enhance: Unflip 1 foundation.
Response: After you block with this card, your rival's next attack this turn gets -2 damage.
Enhance Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage, or if it has “Hardened” in its name, it gets +3 damage instead.
Enhance: Add this card to your hand after it resolves. Only playable if this attack’s damage is 15 or greater.
Enhance [Your turn] Destroy 1 foundation: your rival commits 1 foundation.
